Nightlight/Termitron::

Nightlight saw worried in the screen how her friend needed help, she 
wasn't sure what to do.

Termitron fired 25 times against Train Wreck.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Arrow climbed to his feet. He had somehow survived the grenade, and 
managed,
> more miraculously, to stay in one piece. He was mangled up pretty 
good,
> though. Perplex sees Arrow.
> 
> Perplex: Arrow!
> 
> Perplex runs out. Train Wreck lies in wait and laughs. He speeds 
ahead,
> Perplex turning around and stopping stupidly. Train Wreck hits him 
brutally
> and crushes his leg under a massive wheel.
> 
> Perplex: Arrow, don't lose...
> 
> Perplex goes into stasis lock right when his computer was telling 
him to do
> so because of major internal damage.
> 
> Arrow: By the Matrix.
> 
> Arrow crawled towards Perplex, but Train Wreck turns around.
> 
> Airbomber: Run his ass over, big man! Train Wreck is a pretty 
crappy driver,
> Arrow! Hahaha!
> 
> Train Wreck revs his engine as a taunt, and speeds towards Arrow. 
Arrow
> raises an arm to cover himself as Train Wreck crazily drove closer, 
meaning
> to crush him.
> 
> Train Wreck: You're welcome! Hahaha!...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@n...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 1:18 AM
> Subject: Re: Trinity
> 
>

ran

> > >

told me

to

he

torso ,
> > > leg,
> > >  > arm and one into his shoulder, close to his main fuel line 
to his
